Posts.Content: Dec 25, 2013 04:56PM Three2013 wrote: my surgery was Dec 2 and no one mentioned this side effect. It took me by surprise and I was a little concerned until I found other patients who shared this odd sensation. I told my husband it was like having brain freeze in my chest. You could feel the cold so strongly. Glad to hear it goes away!!!! Can deal with anything on a temporary basis. Glad your feelings went away.
Posts.Title: Hot or Cold drinks and food, feel in chest on masectomy side vaper LindaKR
